metadata.title: CVE-2022-3767 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Missing validation in DAST analyzer affecting all versions from 1.11.0prior to 3.0.32, allows custom request headers to be sent with everyrequest, regardless of the host.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
